Package game.utils

Class ResetManager

java.lang.Object
game.utils.ResetManager
public class ResetManager extends Object
A reset manager class that manages a list of resettables. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrian Kristanto Modified by:, Bryan Wong, Po Han Tay.

    • getInstance

      public static ResetManager getInstance()
      Returns the instance of the resetManager stored as a data attribute. If one has not been created yet, create a new instance of resetManager.
      Returns:
      the resetManager instance.

    • runRestResettables
